definition: head/chief/first (occasion, thing etc)/classifier for poems, songs etc

sentences.english: A good source is the book and DVD, "The Commanding Heights of the Economy."
sentences.chinese: 最好的信息來源就是書和DVD《經濟雄踞魁首》。

sentences.english: And the hand of the princes and magistrates hath been first in this transgression.
sentences.chinese: 尤其首長和官員，是這罪孽的魁首。

sentences.english: A new medication, with perspiration as a side effect, is the culprit.
sentences.chinese: 有出汗副作用的新藥常常是盜汗的魁首。

sentences.english: George and I usually won in our category.
sentences.chinese: 喬治和我常常在比賽中勇奪魁首。

sentences.english: To catch bandits , first catch the ringleader.
sentences.chinese: 捕捉強盜，第一的捕捉魁首。

definition: the queen of flowers (refers esp. to plum blossom)/(fig.) nickname for a famous beauty or courtesan
head of a clan/natural leader/person of prestige and authority in a domain/suzerain
lit. devils' castle/place occupied by sinister forces
erhua variant of 頂尖|顶尖[ding3 jian1]
underground palace of ghouls, e.g. Asgard of Scandinavian mythology
outstanding heroes/warlords vying for supremacy (in former times)/stars (of sports or pop music)
first under heaven/number one in the country
elder/term of respect for a Buddhist monk
to keep the law/to protect Buddha's teachings/protector of Buddhist law (i.e. temple donor)
